name: pluribus-verification
description: Verification and testing workflow for Pluribus (PBTEST, bus evidence, VPS checks).

name: pluribus-skills-registry
description: Create, validate, and register SKILL.md packages in the shared skills registry.
author: pluribus

name: skill-creator
description: Guide for creating effective skills. This skill should be used when users want to create a new skill (or update an existing skill) that extends Codex's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.

name: pluribus-ux-systems
description: Build or audit the Pluribus UI system (Qwik dashboard, dense surfaces, motion, tokens).
author: pluribus

name: skill-installer
description: Install Codex skills into $CODEX_HOME/skills from a curated list or a GitHub repo path. Use when a user asks to list installable skills, install a curated skill, or install a skill from another repo (including private repos).

name: pluribus-rheomode-gap
description: Identify aleatoric and epistemic gaps and map them into rheomode flows.
author: pluribus

name: pluribus-architecture
description: Architecture and protocol design for Pluribus (DKIN/PAIP, bus, specs, deployment).
author: pluribus
